select
from SCM_TARGET_QUANTITY_MANAGEMENT TQ LEFT JOIN SCM_ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_MANAGE AM ON AM.ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_CODE = TQ.RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT where TQ.DELETESTATUS = '0' AND AM.DELETESTATUS = '0'
and RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{targetname}),'%')
and YEAR like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{year}),'%')
ORDER BY TQ.RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT
select ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_ID AS ID,ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_CODE AS CODE,ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_NAME AS "NAME" from SCM_ACCOUNTABILITY_UNIT_MANAGE where DELETESTATUS = '0' ORDER BY CODE
select RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT AS CODE from SCM_TARGET_QUANTITY_MANAGEMENT where DELETESTATUS = '0' ORDER BY RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT
select TARGET_QUANTITY_MANAGEMENT_ID AS id from SCM_TARGET_QUANTITY_MANAGEMENT where RESPONSIBILITY_UNIT = #{code}
